SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.registry

接口 ItemRegistry

@NonExtendable public interface ItemRegistry
Core interface for custom item registry, providing complete lifecycle management for custom items.

This interface is responsible for:

  • Registration and configuration of custom items
  • Retrieval and validation of item instances

Get the instance through Bukkit.getServicesManager().

另请参阅:
  • custom Item interface

  • 方法详细资料

    • registerItem

      void registerItem(@NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem artisanItem)
      Registers a custom item.
      参数:
      artisanItem - The custom item instance (must not be null)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the builder is null or contains invalid parameters

    • registerTagToMaterial

      void registerTagToMaterial(@NotNull @NotNull Material material, @NotNull @NotNull String... tags)
      Registers tags to a material.
      参数:
      material - The material to tag (must not be null)
      tags - The tags to associate with the material (must not be null)

    • getRegistryId

      @NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey getRegistryId(@Nullable @Nullable ItemStack itemStack)
      Resolves the registry ID from an item stack.

      Vanilla Minecraft items will return their namespace ID.

      Empty items will return ArtisanItem.EMPTY.

      参数:
      itemStack - The target item stack (can be null)
      返回:
      The corresponding registry ID (never null)

    • hasItem

      boolean hasItem(@Nullable @Nullable NamespacedKey registryId)
      Checks if a custom item with the specified ID is registered.

      This method includes vanilla Minecraft items.

      参数:
      registryId - The item ID to check (can be null)
      返回:
      true if the item exists, false otherwise

    • getItemStack

      @NotNull @NotNull ItemStack getItemStack(NamespacedKey registryId, int count)
      Creates an item stack with the specified quantity of the given namespace ID.

      This method is compatible with vanilla Minecraft item namespace IDs.

      参数:
      registryId - The item registry ID (must not be null)
      count - The item quantity (values exceeding the stack limit will be automatically set to the limit)
      返回:
      A new item stack instance (never null)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the item is not registered or parameters are invalid

    • getItemStack

      @NotNull @NotNull ItemStack getItemStack(NamespacedKey registryId)
      Creates an item stack with quantity 1 of the given namespace ID.

      This method is compatible with vanilla Minecraft item namespace IDs.

      参数:
      registryId - The item registry ID (must not be null)
      返回:
      A new item stack instance (never null)

    • isArtisanItem

      boolean isArtisanItem(@Nullable @Nullable NamespacedKey registryId)
      Validates whether the given ID corresponds to a valid custom item.
      参数:
      registryId - The item ID to check (can be null)
      返回:
      true if it is a registered custom item, false otherwise

    • isArtisanItem

      boolean isArtisanItem(@Nullable @Nullable ItemStack itemStack)
      Validates whether the given item stack is a custom item.
      参数:
      itemStack - The item stack to check (can be null)
      返回:
      true if it is a custom item registered by this system, false otherwise

    • getArtisanItem

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem getArtisanItem(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey registryId)
      Gets the item API instance by ID.
      参数:
      registryId - The item registry ID (must not be null)
      返回:
      The item API interface instance (never null)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the item is not registered
      另请参阅:
      • ArtisanItem

      参数:
      itemStack - The target item stack (must not be null)
      返回:
      The item API interface instance (never null)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If it is not a valid custom item

    • getIdByTag

      @NotNull @NotNull @Unmodifiable Collection<NamespacedKey> getIdByTag(@NotNull @NotNull String tag)
      Gets all IDs associated with the specified tag.
      参数:
      tag - The tag to query (must not be null)
      返回:
      An unmodifiable collection of namespace keys

      Gets all tags associated with the specified ID.
      参数:
      id - The namespace key to query (must not be null)
      返回:
      An unmodifiable collection of tags

    • getAllIds

      @NotNull @Unmodifiable @NotNull Set<NamespacedKey> getAllIds()
      Gets all registered item IDs.
      返回:
      An unmodifiable set of all registered namespace keys
